div.p: As per Gov. Abbott's Executive Order issued today, Northside ISD will remain closed through Friday, May 1st. All services currently being provided to our students will continue through that time. We are hopeful of returning to school on Monday, May 4th. Stay safe and take care of yourselves and those around you.

We only have one 2019 yearbook remaining. If you would like to purchase it, please contact Mrs. Wolfe. The cost is $45. You may also send the money and a note to school with your student and we'll get the book to you.

Please click on the link below to view the state competition entry "Spotlight on Projects: Stop and Think/FCCLA FACTS". Viewing and liking their video helps the team with the final results of the competition.

div.class: custom_142182 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

font.i: A MESSAGE FROM THE SUPERINTENDENT: As per Gov. Abbott’s Executive Order issued today, Northside ISD will remain closed through Friday, May 1st. All services currently being provided to our students will continue through that time. We are hopeful of a return to school on Monday, May 4th. This may depend a great deal on how well we follow the guidelines of public health officials and others. Stay safe Indians. Take care of yourselves and those around you. We hope to see you all Monday, May 4th.

div.class: custom_141996 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: Principal’s Response: Below is the official statement from TEA explaining that STAAR testing has been waived for the 2019-2020 school year. We do not have much information at this time, but the Northside Administration is discussing the release of the state testing waiver, as well as the most recent COVID-19 updates. We will release information as soon as we receive it. Please keep praying and stay well.

span.span: Northside I.S.D., faculty, parents, and community are committed to providing opportunities for exemplary and social success that will arm all students with the skills to excel in a globally competitive world.
Northside expects and accepts nothing less than the best.

div.class: custom_102627 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

span.span: Northside ISD does not and shall not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, color, sex, or national origin in any of its activities or operations.
